name: Ensnared (Prototype)
description:
Hey there! Ensnared is a top down shoot 'em up prototype game made for Ludum Dare 41. I didn't have much time at all during the jam, so the game is largely unfinished. More content may be added in the future. Post your top score in the comments!

- WASD: Move

- LClick: Shoot

- 1: Purchase machine gun powerup

- 2: Purchase shotgun powerup

In case you're wondering, the theme of the jam was "Combine two incompatible genres." I tried to do a sort of sandbox survival + twin stick shooter (shooting trees & such to get resources), but due to time restrictions I couldn't put much else in.

Thanks for checking out Ensnared! If you'd like to rate it in Ludum Dare, the page for that is right over here:
